Room.Name: Evander's World Of Weapons Plaza
Room.ShortDescription: You are in Evander's World of Weapons Main Plaza.
Room.LongDescription: The Main Plaza gives you access to all the major shops in this complex, all owned and managed by Evander. On the east is the largest building which houses the Evander Repair Shop. Here, Evander or one of his trusted laborers will repair damaged weapons. On the northwest is the Polearms Emporium where all sorts of unique and interesting weapons may be bought. On the west is the Armory, dealing mostly with chain mail and other metallic armor. On the southwest is the Swordsmith, where various swords and daggers may be bought.
